main.name: Archit Agarwal
main.description: I am a web developer and I use react and Java to develop pages. My objective is to obtain a position that will allow me to utilize my technical skills and willingness to learn in making an organization successful.
main.bio: I am a full-stack developer. I am familiar with  HTML. CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript, Jquery, React Js,  Java 7, Java 8, Spring boot, microservices. Also worked on advance technologies and tools like  Ajax, ES6, JSON, Spring Boot, Jenkins, GIT, Kibana, Swagger, Postman, Mockito, Docker, Ant, Gradle, JIRA, Findbugs, YAML, Sharepoint, Zull, Postman. I like to use my skill set to enhance functionality of the product and make it user friendly.
